meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to 100 meters.
meanings.sent1: The race track was marked in hectometers for accurate measurements.
meanings.sent2: The sign indicated that the next gas station was just a few hectometers away.
meanings.sent3: The farmer mistakenly planted his crops in hectometers instead of meters.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement was so immense that it stretched for hectometers around her.
meanings.sent5: The ruler only measured in hectometers, making it easy to convert to meters.
